titles.title: Forest Fairy Five
アニメちゃんに会える国
森の妖精キノコの娘
FOREST FAIRY FIVE
Forest Fairy Five

relatedanime.anime: Mori no Yousei: Kinoko no Musume

anime.description: A beautiful nation, prospering since ancient times, Japan is now known as the Anime Kingdom. There are more than just humans living there; animes truly do exist in Japan. Past the Fairy Ring, to the world of fairies, live anime-chans. There`s a Fairy Ring in your town, too. Here. And there. Even in Harajuku. Maybe even in the Ashigara mountains. By some chance, we`ll open that door. And we might get to meet the anime-chans. This is the land where you get to meet anime-chans. Source: crunchyroll Note: Premiered with the Anime-chan ni Kaeru Kuni (アニメちゃんに会える国) television variety program on Japan`s Tokyo MX1 channel.

tag.name: CGI
tag.description: Computer-generated imagery (CGI) or computer animation is the art of creating moving images via the use of computers. It is a subfield of computer graphics and animation. Increasingly it is created by means of 3D computer graphics, though 2D computer graphics are still widely used for stylistic, low bandwidth, and faster real-time rendering needs. Sometimes the target of the animation is the computer itself, but sometimes the target is another medium, such as film.

tag.name: 3D CG animation
tag.description: Abbreviation for "three-dimensional computer generated animation" or "computer graphics" (CGI). The traditional 2D art is enhanced by 3D imagery developed through computer modeling software. Done in the right way, this union of 3D in a 2D animated world can be a very beautiful relationship. The difference lies in what lacks the traditional 2D animation all together and may give term to something produced entirely with 3D graphics (such as the 2006 remake of "Appleseed" , 2007`s "Vexille", the 2008 addition to the "Biohazard" series and the more well known "Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within" and "Advent Children").

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: half-length episodes
tag.description: Half-length episodes are regular episodes that are somewhat shorter than the standard length. This includes episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length; shows with episodes up to and including 10 minutes are http://anidb.net/t5852 [short episodes] instead.

episode.title: Episode 1
episode.summary: We take a look into the Anime Kingdom, where we meet three forest fairies, Muscaria, Virosa and Porcini. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 2
episode.summary: Virosa, Muscaria and Porcini talk about their New Year`s. They play charades. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 4
episode.summary: We meet Paludosa, a mushroom fairy who can`t leave the water. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 3
episode.summary: Nekonoshima is an island known for being filled with cats, but the cats have gone missing. Natsuki and the Party investigate. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 8
episode.summary: Muscaria loses her "ka." She tries to ask for help finding it, but she can`t say what she`s looking for. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 7
episode.summary: The fairies meet a human school teacher. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 6
episode.summary: Paludosa and Virosa play shiritori. Jojo comes across a maitake fair, Mai, who seems to be a bit shy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 5
episode.summary: The Fairies hang out on a hill. They meet a human nurse. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 12
episode.summary: Muscaria and Porcini challenge Jojo to go into a magical cave to test his guts. It`s a harmless game, but something seems off. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 11
episode.summary: Mai discovers that she, too, has a special ability, while Yellow discovers something more unfortunate about himself. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 10
episode.summary: Muscaria, Porcini and Virosa practice flag signaling. Meanwhile, Mai and Paludosa go hiking. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 9
episode.summary: The fairy world is inspired by humans to take on jobs. Muscaria and the gang want to work as idols in the future. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 13
episode.summary: Muscaria accidentally turns herself into curry. There`s only one way to bring her back to normal, but it won`t be easy. Source: crunchyroll
